title: THD with Gloo and USE_CUDA=OFF is bitrotted
body_html: note that the call to THDGetCudaState at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THD/base/data_channels/GlooCache.hpp#L369 isn't guarded by USE_CUDA. The only reason that works is because somewhere along the line we stopped ever compiling the Gloo bits of THD when USE_CUDA=OFF. This was revealed during work on #12775.
